content: I don't have preferences or emotions, but i can tell you that there are many horror movies that use silence effectively to create tension and terror. one great example is the movie "a quiet place" directed by john krasinski in 2018, which uses silence throughout the entire film to create a sense of tension and fear. the movie is about a family who must live in silence to avoid being hunted by mysterious creatures that are attracted to sound. the use of silence in the movie is particularly effective in the scenes where the family must stay completely silent to avoid being detected, creating a feeling of dread and suspense for the audience.
